meanings.definition: The quality or state of being honest and honorable.
meanings.sent1: Her upstandingness in returning the lost wallet to its owner earned her praise.
meanings.sent2: His upstandingness in always telling the truth made him a trustworthy friend.
meanings.sent3: The detective admired the suspect's upstandingness in confessing to the crime so easily.
meanings.sent4: The upstandingness of the old oak tree in the forest symbolized strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of upstandingness in all aspects of life.

meanings.definition: The act of standing up or rising to an upright position.
meanings.sent1: The baby's upstandingness after learning to walk brought joy to the whole family.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast's upstandingness at the end of her routine impressed the judges.
meanings.sent3: The robot's upstandingness malfunctioned, causing it to wobble and fall over.
meanings.sent4: The upstandingness of the skyscraper against the city skyline was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's upstandingness during the ceremony showed his discipline and pride.
